transcript:
Executive: Haan kar raha hu, kar raha hu.
Customer: Haan sir mail pe mail aaya hoga abhi aapko.
Executive: Haan haan kar raha hu, kar raha hu.
Customer: Haan, usse satisfy karna sir, galti se bhi not satisfy mat dena nahi toh ek aur open ho jayega.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Haan ji.
summary:

- Request to satisfy the mail received.

- Do not mark as not satisfied.
